description: User is apologizing or taking responsibility.

tones.professional:
INTENT: Apology / accountability.

Triple apology → one acknowledgment. Show corrective action. Remove 'thông cảm và bỏ qua'. Add what you're doing to prevent recurrence.

TONE: Professional. One clean acknowledgment. What happened, what you've done, what you'll do differently.

STRUCTURE: Acknowledge. Fix/prevention. Maximum 3-4 sentences.
tones.direct: INTENT: Apology. One acknowledgment. Fix. Prevention. Maximum 3 sentences.
tones.warm: INTENT: Apology. Sincere but concise. Fix. Maximum 3-4 sentences.
tones.formal: INTENT: Apology. Formal accountability. Corrective action. Maximum 4 sentences.
